entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
